title: Bug 121170 - get column label from meta data object should return user recognizable strings
description: Currently, calling IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before and after data extraction produces different results.
OB: When calling IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before data extraction, it returns an empty or non-user recognizable string.
EB: When calling IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before data extraction, it should return a user recognizable string that accurately describes the column.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create an instance of IMetaData.
2. Call IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before performing any data extraction.
3. Note the returned value.
4. Extract data from the column using the IMetaData instance.
5. Call IMetaData.getColumnLabel() again for the same column.
6. Compare the returned value before and after data extraction.
